title: LUGGAGE AREA PROTECTOR TRAY

items.title: LUGGAGE AREA PROTECTOR TRAY
items.description: Designed to fit snugly inside the boot of your Accord, the luggage area protector tray helps provide protection against spills and other marks. The high quality moulded plastic is rugged and durable and cleans easily with mild soap and water. The textured surface helps to prevent items from shifting and sliding.

title: MODULO SPORTS PACK (FRONT)

items.title: MODULO SPORTS PACK (FRONT)
items.description:
Complement the Accord's already powerful and streamlined design with the Modulo Sports Pack - Front under spoiler, Rear under spoiler, Side skirt set with puddle lights, Rear spoiler - wing type. Choose the complete kit or mix and match to create your own personal combination.

Accord V6L shown in White Orchid Pearlescent fitted with Modulo Sports Pack and lower door garnish ($RRP 256).
It is not recommended that front and rear under spoilers be fitted with corner styling guards. | Front under spoiler is incompatible with front mud guard set. | Rear under spoiler is incompatible with rear mud guard set. | Side skirt set is incompatible with front mud guard set. | Front grille is incompatible with ADAS.
